statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_data->>'purchase_amount' > '1000';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_data->>'purchase_date' >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, email, behavior_data->'loyalty_points' FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_data->>'loyalty_points' > 100
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, behavior_data FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number, behavior_data->'last_activity' FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name ILIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customers_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_2 FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_1='Value1';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_3 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_1, behavior_3 FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_1, behavior_3 ASC;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = 5678;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT behavior_1, behavior_2 FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 9876;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_3 <> 'negative';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM marketing_promotions WHERE promotion_id > 5;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM marketing_promotions WHERE promotion_id > 500 ORDER BY promotion_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%discount%'
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) FROM behavior_data GROUP BY behavior_type
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT preference_category, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT promotion_category, promotion_details FROM AffiliateMarketing WHERE promotion_category = 'Clothing' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedRecommendations WHERE recommendation_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'clothing';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM CustomerBehavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, promotion_category FROM AffiliateMarketing WHERE promotion_category IN ('electronics', 'beauty') ORDER BY promotion_category;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM PersonalizedRecommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.preference_category, r.recommendation_details FROM CustomerPreferences c JOIN PersonalizedRecommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.recommendation_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date;

SELECT customer_id, name, email, age, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS total_recommendations FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Recommendations ON Customers.customer_id = Recommendations.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, quantity, amount FROM Purchases WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT recommendation_id, product_id, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
